page.title: 09GLASSARY SPRING FAYRE
page.content: EVERY YEAR IN THE MONTH OF MAY THE SCHOOL HOLDS A{SPRING FAYRE}TO RAISE FUNDS FOR THE SCHOOL. FOR WEEKS BEFORE THIS EVENT EVERYONE IN THE VILLAGE IS BUSY BAKING CAKES, KNITTING, SEWING AND GROWING THINGS TO BE SOLD ON THE DAY OF THE FAYRE. THIS YEAR OUR SPRING FAYRE WAS HELD ON SATURDAY 25 MAY AND REV. NORMAN WHITE OUR MINISTER WAS GUEST OF HONOUR. THERE WERE LOTS OF STALLS, SUCH AS CAKE AND CANDY, TOYS, CRAFT, PLANTS, SOFT GOODS, BOTTLES AND JUMBLE. THERE WAS ALSO A STALL WHERE YOU COULD BUY ICE-CREAM AND THE SCHOOL DINING ROOM WAS MADE INTO A CAFE WHERE YOU COULD GET TEA, COFFEE, JUICE, SANDWICHES AND CAKES. IT WAS A GREAT DAY AND WE RAISED Â£208.20 FOR THE SCHOOL FUNDS.
